title: Add Pricing and Discounts
instruction: Add a pricing schedule section that specifies: (a) wholesale pricing at 40% discount from MSRP, (b) volume discounts of 5% for orders over 100 units, (c) annual price adjustment based on CPI with 90 days notice.

party1.name: TechVenture Solutions Inc.
party1.address: 350 Fifth Avenue, Suite 1800, New York, NY 10118
